file.name: api-definition.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: "the api name"
  description: "the description"
  version: "1.0"
servers:
  - url: "http://api.example.com"
    description: "production"
  - url: "http://stage.example.com"
    description: "staging"
paths:
  "/courses":
    description: course list
    get:
      description: gets all courses
      responses:
        "200":
          "$ref": "#/components/responses/course-list"
    post:
      description: creates a course
      requestBody:
        description: course creation
        content:
          "application/x-www-form-urlencoded":
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                acronym:
                  type: string
                name:
                  type: string
                description:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "201":
          "$ref": "#/components/responses/course-list"
  "/courses/{acr}":
    description: course
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          "$ref": "#/components/responses/course-list"
      parameters:
        - name: acr
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
components:
  schemas:
    course-item:
      type: object
      required: [name, description, acronym]
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        acronym:
          type: string
    course-list:
      type: array
      items:
        "$ref": "#/components/schemas/course-item"
  responses:
    "course-detail":
      description: course detail
      content:
        "application/json":
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/course-item"
    "course-list":
      description: course list
      content:
        "application/json":
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/course-list"
    "created":
      description: created
